Uses of Interface
jade.ui.Camera

Packages that use Camera
jade.ui   
 

Uses of Camera in jade.ui
 

Methods in jade.ui with parameters of type Camera
 void Terminal.bufferCamera(Camera camera)
          Buffers the view field of the camera at its registered screen center.
 void Terminal.bufferRelative(Camera camera, ColoredChar ch, Coordinate pos)
          Buffers the given ColoredChar relative to the registered screen center of the Camera.
 void Terminal.bufferRelative(Camera camera, ColoredChar ch, int x, int y)
          Buffers the given ColoredChar relative to the registered screen center of the Camera.
 Coordinate Terminal.cameraCenter(Camera camera)
          Returns the registered screen center for the provided Camera
 boolean Terminal.cameraRegistered(Camera camera)
          Returns true if the Camera is registered.
 void Terminal.registerCamera(Camera camera, Coordinate screenCenter)
          Registers a Camera so that when bufferCamera is called its view field is drawn at the provided screen center.
 void Terminal.registerCamera(Camera camera, int screenCenterX, int screenCenterY)
          Registers a Camera so that when bufferCamera is called its view field is drawn at the provided screen center.
 void Terminal.unregisterCamera(Camera camera)
          Unregisters the Camera so that it cannot be drawn on screen.
